text: Clinical biostatistics is concerned with research into the principles and methodology used in the design and analysis of clinical research and to apply statistical theory to clinical medicine.http://www.iscb.info/ There is a society for Clinical Biostatistics with annual conferences since its founding in 1978.http://www.iscb.info/ Clinical Biostatistics is taught in postgraduate biostatistical and applied statistical degrees, for example as part of the BCA Master of Biostatistics program in Australia. ==References== Category:Clinical research
title: Clinical biostatistics
